test-case.sql: SELECT 1 as a
SELECT t_order.* FROM t_order t_order WHERE user_id = ? AND order_id = ?
SELECT t_order.order_id,t_order.user_id,status FROM t_order t_order WHERE t_order.user_id = ? AND order_id = ?
SELECT * FROM t_order_item WHERE item_id <> ? ORDER BY item_id
SELECT * FROM t_order_item WHERE item_id != ? ORDER BY item_id
SELECT * FROM t_order_item WHERE item_id IS NOT NULL AND item_id NOT IN (?, ?) ORDER BY item_id
SELECT * FROM t_order_item WHERE item_id IS NOT NULL AND item_id NOT BETWEEN ? AND ? ORDER BY item_id
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE user_id = ? AND order_id = ?
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE order_id = ? AND order_id = ?
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE order_id IN (?, ?) AND order_id IN (?, ?) ORDER BY order_id
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE user_id IN (?, ?, ?) AND order_id IN (?, ?) ORDER BY user_id, order_id
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE user_id BETWEEN ? AND ? AND order_id BETWEEN ? AND ? ORDER BY user_id, order_id
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE user_id >= ? AND user_id <= ? AND order_id >= ? AND order_id <= ? ORDER BY user_id, order_id
SELECT count(0) as orders_count FROM t_order o WHERE o.status LIKE CONCAT('%%', ?, '%%') AND o.user_id IN (?, ?) AND o.order_id BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT count(0) as orders_count FROM t_order o WHERE o.status ~~ CONCAT('%%', ?, '%%') AND o.user_id IN (?, ?) AND o.order_id BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT i.* FROM t_order o JOIN t_order_item i ON o.user_id = i.user_id AND o.order_id = i.order_id WHERE o.user_id IN (?, ?) AND o.order_id BETWEEN ? AND ? ORDER BY i.item_id
SELECT i.* FROM t_order o JOIN t_order_item i ON o.user_id = i.user_id AND o.order_id = i.order_id ORDER BY i.item_id

SELECT i.* FROM t_order o JOIN t_order_item i ON o.user_id = i.user_id AND o.order_id = i.order_id JOIN t_broadcast_table c ON o.status = c.status WHERE o.user_id IN (?, ?) AND o.order_id BETWEEN ? AND ? AND o.status = ? ORDER BY i.item_id
SELECT length.item_id password FROM t_order_item length where length.item_id = ?
SELECT i.* FROM t_order o FORCE INDEX(order_index) JOIN t_order_item i ON o.order_id=i.order_id AND o.user_id = i.user_id WHERE o.order_id = ?
SELECT i.* FROM t_order o FORCE INDEX(order_index) JOIN t_order_item i ON o.order_id=i.order_id AND o.user_id = i.user_id AND o.order_id = ?
SELECT i.* FROM t_order o FORCE INDEX(order_index) JOIN t_order_item i ON o.order_id=i.order_id AND o.user_id = i.user_id AND o.order_id in (?,?)
SELECT SUM(user_id) AS user_id_sum FROM t_order
SELECT COUNT(*) AS orders_count FROM t_order
SELECT COUNT(*) AS orders_count FROM t_order WHERE order_id > 1-1
SELECT COUNT(*) AS orders_count FROM t_order WHERE order_id > 1 - 1
SELECT MAX(user_id) AS max_user_id FROM t_order
SELECT MIN(user_id) AS min_user_id FROM t_order
SELECT AVG(user_id) AS user_id_avg FROM t_order
SELECT COUNT(*) AS items_count FROM t_order o, t_order_item i WHERE o.user_id = i.user_id AND o.order_id = i.order_id AND o.user_id IN (?, ?) AND o.order_id BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) AS items_count FROM t_order o JOIN t_order_item i ON o.user_id = i.user_id AND o.order_id = i.order_id WHERE o.user_id IN (?, ?) AND o.order_id BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(`order_id`) AS orders_count FROM t_order
SELECT * /* this is block comment */ FROM /* this is another block comment */ t_order where status='1'
SELECT * -- this is an line comment FROM -- this is another line comment t_order where status='1'
SELECT o.order_id + 1 * 2 as exp FROM t_order AS o ORDER BY o.order_id
SELECT DATE(i.creation_date) AS creation_date FROM `t_order_item` AS i ORDER BY DATE(i.creation_date) DESC
SELECT * FROM t_order o WHERE o.status REGEXP ? AND o.order_id IN (?, ?)
SELECT SUM(order_id) AS orders_sum, user_id FROM t_order GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY user_id
SELECT COUNT(order_id) AS orders_count, user_id FROM t_order GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY user_id
SELECT MAX(order_id) AS max_order_id, user_id FROM t_order GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY user_id
SELECT MIN(order_id) AS min_order_id, user_id FROM t_order GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY user_id
SELECT AVG(order_id) AS orders_avg, user_id FROM t_order GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY user_id
SELECT SUM(order_id) AS orders_sum, user_id FROM t_order GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY orders_sum DESC
SELECT count(*) as items_count FROM t_order o JOIN t_order_item i ON o.user_id = i.user_id AND o.order_id = i.order_id WHERE o.user_id IN (?, ?) AND o.order_id BETWEEN ? AND ? GROUP BY o.user_id
SELECT user_id FROM t_order GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY user_id LIMIT ?
SELECT user_id, SUM(order_id) AS orders_sum FROM t_order GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY SUM(order_id) LIMIT ?
SELECT o.user_id uid FROM t_order o GROUP BY o.user_id ORDER BY o.user_id
SELECT SUM(order_id) AS orders_sum, user_id as `key` FROM t_order GROUP BY `key`
SELECT COUNT(order_id) AS orders_count, user_id FROM t_order GROUP BY 2 ORDER BY 2
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE order_id = ? OR order_id = ?
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE order_id = ? OR user_id = ? ORDER BY order_id
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE order_id = ? OR status = ? ORDER BY order_id
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE (order_id = ? OR status = ?) AND user_id = ?
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE ((status = ? AND (order_id = ? OR (order_id = ?)) AND (user_id = ? OR (user_id = ?)))) ORDER BY order_id
SELECT i.* FROM t_order o JOIN t_order_item i ON o.user_id = i.user_id AND o.order_id = i.order_id WHERE (o.order_id = ? OR o.order_id = ?) AND o.user_id = ?

SELECT i.* FROM t_order o JOIN t_order_item i ON o.user_id = i.user_id AND o.order_id = i.order_id JOIN t_broadcast_table c ON o.status = c.status WHERE (o.order_id = ? OR o.order_id = ?) AND o.user_id = ? AND o.status = ?
SELECT * FROM t_order o ORDER BY o.order_id, 2 DESC
SELECT i.* FROM t_order o, t_order_item i WHERE o.order_id = i.order_id AND o.status = 'init' ORDER BY o.order_id DESC, 1
SELECT o.order_id as gen_order_id_ FROM t_order o ORDER BY o.order_id
SELECT i.* FROM t_order o, t_order_item i WHERE o.order_id = i.order_id AND o.status = 'init' ORDER BY i.creation_date DESC, o.order_id DESC, i.item_id
SELECT o.order_id as gen_order_id_ FROM t_order o ORDER BY o.order_id NULLS FIRST
SELECT o.order_id as gen_order_id_ FROM t_order o ORDER BY o.order_id ASC NULLS LAST
SELECT *, order_id, o.* FROM t_order o ORDER BY o.order_id
SELECT o.* FROM t_order o ORDER BY o.order_id
SELECT o.* FROM t_order o ORDER BY o.order_id
SELECT * FROM t_order o ORDER BY order_id
SELECT t_order.* FROM t_order ORDER BY t_order.order_id
SELECT * FROM t_order ORDER BY order_id
SELECT i.* FROM t_order o JOIN t_order_item i ON o.user_id = i.user_id AND o.order_id = i.order_id WHERE o.user_id IN (?, ?) AND o.order_id BETWEEN ? AND ? ORDER BY i.item_id DESC OFFSET ?
SELECT i.*, o.* FROM t_order o JOIN t_order_item i ON o.user_id = i.user_id AND o.order_id = i.order_id ORDER BY item_id
SELECT i.* FROM t_order o JOIN t_order_item i ON o.user_id = i.user_id AND o.order_id = i.order_id WHERE o.user_id IN (?, ?) AND o.order_id BETWEEN ? AND ? ORDER BY i.item_id DESC LIMIT ?

SELECT * FROM (SELECT TOP (?) row_number() OVER (ORDER BY i.item_id DESC) AS rownum_, i.item_id, o.order_id as order_id, o.status as status, o.user_id as user_id FROM t_order o JOIN t_order_item i ON o.user_id = i.user_id AND o.order_id = i.order_id WHERE o.user_id IN (?, ?) AND o.order_id BETWEEN ? AND ?) AS row_

SELECT * FROM (SELECT row_.*, rownum rownum_ FROM (SELECT order0_.order_id as order_id, order0_.status as status, order0_.user_id as user_id FROM t_order order0_ JOIN t_order_item i ON order0_.user_id = i.user_id AND order0_.order_id = i.order_id WHERE order0_.user_id IN (?, ?) AND order0_.order_id BETWEEN ? AND ? ORDER BY i.item_id DESC) row_ WHERE rownum <= ?)
SELECT i.* FROM `t_order` o JOIN `t_order_item` i ON o.user_id = i.user_id AND o.order_id = i.order_id WHERE o.`user_id` IN (?, ?) AND o.`order_id` BETWEEN ? AND ? ORDER BY i.item_id DESC LIMIT ?, ?

SELECT i.* FROM `t_order` o JOIN `t_order_item` i ON o.user_id = i.user_id AND o.order_id = i.order_id WHERE o.`user_id` IN (?, ?) AND o.`order_id` BETWEEN ? AND ? ORDER BY i.item_id DESC LIMIT ? OFFSET ?
SELECT i.* FROM t_order o JOIN t_order_item i ON o.user_id = i.user_id AND o.order_id = i.order_id WHERE o.user_id IN (?, ?) AND o.order_id BETWEEN ? AND ? ORDER BY i.item_id DESC OFFSET ? LIMIT ?

SELECT * FROM (SELECT TOP (?) row_number() OVER (ORDER BY i.item_id DESC) AS rownum_, i.item_id, o.order_id as order_id, o.status as status, o.user_id as user_id FROM t_order o JOIN t_order_item i ON o.user_id = i.user_id AND o.order_id = i.order_id WHERE o.user_id IN (?, ?) AND o.order_id BETWEEN ? AND ?) AS row_ WHERE row_.rownum_ > ?

SELECT * FROM (SELECT TOP (?) row_number() OVER (ORDER BY i.item_id DESC) AS rownum_, i.item_id, o.order_id as order_id, o.status as status, o.user_id as user_id FROM t_order o JOIN t_order_item i ON o.user_id = i.user_id AND o.order_id = i.order_id WHERE o.user_id IN (?, ?) AND o.order_id BETWEEN ? AND ?) AS row_ WHERE row_.rownum_ >= ?

SELECT * FROM (SELECT row_.*, rownum rownum_ FROM (SELECT order0_.order_id as order_id, order0_.status as status, order0_.user_id as user_id FROM t_order order0_ JOIN t_order_item i ON order0_.user_id = i.user_id AND order0_.order_id = i.order_id WHERE order0_.user_id IN (?, ?) AND order0_.order_id BETWEEN ? AND ? ORDER BY i.item_id DESC) row_ WHERE rownum <= ?) t WHERE t.rownum_ > ?

SELECT * FROM (SELECT row_.*, rownum rownum_ FROM (SELECT order0_.order_id as order_id, order0_.status as status, order0_.user_id as user_id FROM t_order order0_ JOIN t_order_item i ON order0_.user_id = i.user_id AND order0_.order_id = i.order_id WHERE order0_.user_id IN (?, ?) AND order0_.order_id BETWEEN ? AND ? ORDER BY i.item_id DESC) row_ WHERE rownum <= ?) t WHERE t.rownum_ >= ?
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE ROWNUM <= ? ORDER BY order_id
SELECT * FROM t_order ORDER BY order_id OFFSET 0 ROW FETCH NEXT ? ROWS ONLY

SELECT i.user_id FROM t_order o JOIN t_order_item i ON o.user_id = i.user_id AND o.order_id = i.order_id WHERE o.user_id IN (?, ?) AND o.order_id BETWEEN ? AND ? GROUP BY i.item_id ORDER BY i.item_id DESC LIMIT ?, ?

SELECT i.user_id FROM t_order o JOIN t_order_item i ON o.user_id = i.user_id AND o.order_id = i.order_id WHERE o.user_id IN (?, ?) AND o.order_id BETWEEN ? AND ? GROUP BY i.user_id ORDER BY i.item_id DESC LIMIT ?, ?
SELECT i.* FROM t_order o INNER JOIN t_order_item i ON o.order_id = i.order_id WHERE o.order_id = ?
SELECT t_order_item.* FROM t_order JOIN t_order_item ON t_order.order_id = t_order_item.order_id WHERE t_order.order_id = ?
SELECT i.* FROM t_order o JOIN t_order_item i USING(order_id) WHERE o.order_id = ?
SELECT * FROM "t_order_item" WHERE "item_id" != ? ORDER BY "item_id"
SELECT * FROM t_order where status='\''
SELECT * FROM t_order where status="\""
SELECT status as 'status' FROM t_order
SELECT DISTINCT item_id FROM t_order_item ORDER BY item_id
SELECT DISTINCT t_order.order_id FROM t_order ORDER BY order_id
SELECT DISTINCT order_id, user_id, status FROM t_order ORDER BY order_id
SELECT DISTINCT * FROM t_order WHERE order_id > 1100 ORDER BY order_id
SELECT DISTINCT t_order.*, t_order_item.order_id FROM t_order, t_order_item WHERE t_order.order_id = t_order_item.order_id ORDER BY t_order.order_id
SELECT SUM(DISTINCT order_id) s FROM t_order WHERE order_id < 1100
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT order_id) c FROM t_order WHERE order_id < 1100
SELECT DISTINCT(item_id) FROM t_order_item ORDER BY item_id
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT order_id), SUM(DISTINCT order_id) FROM t_order WHERE order_id < 1100
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT user_id + order_id) c FROM t_order WHERE order_id < 1100
SELECT order_id, COUNT(DISTINCT order_id) c FROM t_order WHERE order_id < 1100 GROUP BY order_id ORDER BY order_id
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT order_id) c, order_id FROM t_order GROUP BY order_id ORDER BY order_id
SELECT sum(if(status=0, 1, 0)) func_status FROM t_order WHERE user_id = ? AND order_id = ?
SELECT INTERVAL(status,1,5) func_status FROM t_order WHERE user_id = ? AND order_id = ?
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE user_id = ? FOR UPDATE

select t.*,o.item_id as item_id,(case when t.status = 'init' then '已启用' when t.status = 'failed' then '已停用' end) as stateName from t_order t left join t_order_item as o on o.order_id =t.order_id where t.order_id=1000 limit 1
SELECT * FROM t_order o LEFT JOIN t_order_item m ON o.order_id = m.order_id AND o.user_id = m.user_id order by o.order_id, m.item_id
SELECT * FROM t_broadcast_table
SELECT * FROM t_user WHERE user_id <= 15 ORDER BY user_id
SELECT user_id, pwd FROM t_user WHERE pwd = 'a10'
SELECT user_id FROM t_user WHERE pwd in ('a10', 'b11')
SELECT user_id FROM t_user WHERE pwd in ('a10', 'b11') and user_id = 10
SELECT * FROM t_user WHERE pwd in ('a10', 'b11') OR user_id = 10
SELECT * FROM t_user u INNER JOIN t_user_item m ON u.user_id=m.user_id WHERE u.user_id IN (0, 11)
SELECT * FROM t_single_table
SELECT * FROM t_single_table s INNER JOIN t_order o ON s.id = o.order_id
SELECT * FROM t_single_table s INNER JOIN t_user o ON s.id = o.user_id
SELECT o.*, i.* FROM t_order_federate o, t_order_item_federate i WHERE o.order_id = ? AND i.item_id = ?
SELECT o.*, i.* FROM t_order_federate o, t_order_item_federate i WHERE o.order_id = ? AND i.item_id = ? LIMIT ?

SELECT user_id, CONCAT('SUM:', total, '.') AS content FROM (SELECT user_id, SUM(order_id_sharding) AS total FROM t_order_federate_sharding GROUP BY user_id HAVING SUM(order_id_sharding) > ?) AS temp ORDER BY temp.user_id
SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(i.item_id SEPARATOR ';') AS item_ids FROM t_order_federate o INNER JOIN t_order_item_federate_sharding i ON o.order_id = i.item_id WHERE i.order_id >= ?
select t_order_federate.*, t_order_item_federate_sharding.* from t_order_federate,t_order_item_federate_sharding where t_order_federate.order_id = t_order_item_federate_sharding.item_id

select t_order_federate.*, t_order_item_federate_sharding.* from t_order_federate, t_order_item_federate_sharding where t_order_federate.order_id = t_order_item_federate_sharding.item_id AND t_order_item_federate_sharding.order_id = ?
SELECT SUM(DISTINCT user_id), SUM(order_id_sharding) FROM t_order_federate_sharding WHERE order_id_sharding > ?
SELECT (SELECT MAX(user_id) FROM t_order_federate_sharding) max_user_id, order_id_sharding, status FROM t_order_federate_sharding WHERE order_id_sharding > ?
SELECT user_id, SUM(order_id_sharding) FROM t_order_federate_sharding GROUP BY user_id HAVING SUM(order_id_sharding) > ? ORDER BY user_id
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_order WHERE order_id < ?
SELECT SUM(CRC32(`order_id`)) FROM t_order WHERE order_id = ?
select o.order_id_sharding, i.order_id from t_order_federate_sharding o, t_order_item_federate_sharding i where o.order_id_sharding = i.item_id
select o.order_id_sharding, i.order_id from t_order_federate_sharding o, t_order_item_federate_sharding i where o.order_id_sharding = i.item_id and i.order_id > ?
select o.order_id_sharding, i.order_id from t_order_federate_sharding o, t_order_item_federate_sharding i where o.order_id_sharding = i.item_id and i.order_id > ?

select t_user_encrypt_federate_sharding.user_id, t_user_encrypt_federate_sharding.pwd, t_user_info.information from t_user_encrypt_federate_sharding, t_user_info where t_user_encrypt_federate_sharding.user_id = t_user_info.user_id order by t_user_encrypt_federate_sharding.user_id

select t_user_encrypt_federate_sharding.user_id, t_user_encrypt_federate_sharding.pwd, t_user_info.information from t_user_encrypt_federate_sharding, t_user_info where t_user_encrypt_federate_sharding.user_id = t_user_info.user_id and t_user_encrypt_federate_sharding.user_id > ?

select t_order_federate.* from t_order_federate, t_order_item_federate_sharding where t_order_federate.order_id = t_order_item_federate_sharding.item_id ORDER BY t_order_item_federate_sharding.user_id
select t_user_encrypt_federate.user_id, t_user_encrypt_federate.pwd, t_user_info.information from t_user_encrypt_federate, t_user_info where t_user_encrypt_federate.user_id = t_user_info.user_id

select t_user_encrypt_federate.user_id, t_user_encrypt_federate.pwd, t_user_info.information from t_user_encrypt_federate, t_user_info where t_user_encrypt_federate.user_id = t_user_info.user_id and t_user_encrypt_federate.user_id > ?
SELECT o.item_id, o.order_id, o.creation_date, s.id FROM t_order_item o INNER JOIN t_single_table s ON o.order_id = s.id ORDER BY o.item_id

select t_order_federate.*, t_order_item_federate_sharding.* from t_order_federate, t_order_item_federate_sharding where t_order_federate.order_id = t_order_item_federate_sharding.item_id AND t_order_item_federate_sharding.remarks = 't_order_item_federate_sharding'
select o.*, i.* from t_order_federate o, t_order_item_federate_sharding i where o.order_id = i.item_id
SELECT * FROM (SELECT order_id_sharding, user_id FROM t_order_federate_sharding WHERE order_id_sharding = 1010) AS TEMP
SELECT AVG(order_id_sharding) AS order_id_sharding_avg FROM (SELECT order_id_sharding, user_id FROM t_order_federate_sharding WHERE order_id_sharding = 1010) AS TEMP

SELECT order_id_sharding AS order_id, user_id, status FROM t_order_federate_sharding WHERE order_id_sharding = ? UNION ALL SELECT order_id, user_id, status FROM t_order_item_federate_sharding WHERE user_id = ?
SELECT order_id, user_id, order_name, type_char, type_boolean, type_smallint, type_enum, type_decimal, type_date, type_time, type_timestamp FROM t_shadow WHERE user_id = ?
SELECT order_id, user_id, order_name, type_char, type_boolean, type_smallint, type_enum, type_decimal, type_date, type_time, type_timestamp FROM t_shadow WHERE user_id = ?
SELECT order_id, user_id, order_name, type_char, type_boolean, type_smallint, type_enum, type_decimal, type_date, type_time, type_timestamp FROM t_shadow WHERE user_id = ?
SELECT order_id, user_id, order_name, type_char, type_boolean, type_smallint, type_enum, type_decimal, type_date, type_time, type_timestamp FROM t_shadow WHERE user_id = ?
SELECT * FROM t_order o INNER JOIN t_order_item i ON o.order_id = i.order_id WHERE o.user_id = ? ORDER BY o.order_id, 7
SELECT * FROM t_order o INNER JOIN t_order_item i ON o.order_id = i.order_id WHERE o.user_id = ? ORDER BY o.order_id, 7 LIMIT 1, 2
SELECT MIN(o.order_id), MIN(o.merchant_id), i.product_id FROM t_order o INNER JOIN t_order_item i ON o.order_id = i.order_id WHERE o.user_id = ? GROUP BY i.product_id
SELECT * FROM t_order o CROSS JOIN t_order_item i WHERE o.user_id = ? ORDER BY o.order_id, 7 LIMIT 10, 10
SELECT * FROM t_order o LEFT JOIN t_order_item i ON o.order_id = i.item_id WHERE o.user_id = ? ORDER BY o.order_id, 7
SELECT * FROM t_order o RIGHT JOIN t_order_item i ON o.order_id = i.item_id WHERE i.user_id = ? ORDER BY i.item_id, 7
SELECT * FROM t_order o FULL JOIN t_order_item i ON o.order_id = i.item_id WHERE o.user_id = ? OR i.user_id = ? ORDER BY o.order_id, 7
SELECT * FROM t_order o INNER JOIN t_merchant m ON o.merchant_id = m.merchant_id WHERE o.user_id = ? ORDER BY o.order_id
SELECT * FROM t_order o INNER JOIN t_merchant m ON o.merchant_id = m.merchant_id WHERE o.user_id = ? ORDER BY o.order_id LIMIT 1, 2
SELECT MIN(o.order_id), MIN(o.merchant_id), MIN(m.merchant_name) FROM t_order o INNER JOIN t_merchant m ON o.merchant_id = m.merchant_id WHERE o.user_id = ? GROUP BY m.merchant_id
SELECT * FROM t_product p INNER JOIN t_product_detail d ON p.product_id = d.product_id WHERE p.product_id > ? ORDER BY p.product_id DESC
SELECT * FROM t_product p INNER JOIN t_product_detail d ON p.product_id = d.product_id WHERE p.product_id > ? ORDER BY p.product_id DESC LIMIT 2, 5
SELECT o.order_id, o.user_id, o.status, o.merchant_id, (SELECT t.merchant_name FROM t_merchant t WHERE t.merchant_id = o.merchant_id) AS merchant_name FROM t_order o WHERE o.order_id = ?
SELECT * FROM (SELECT o.* FROM t_order o WHERE o.user_id IN (10, 11, 12)) AS t, t_order_item i WHERE t.order_id = i.order_id AND t.order_id > ? ORDER BY item_id
SELECT * FROM t_order o WHERE o.order_id IN (SELECT i.order_id FROM t_order_item i INNER JOIN t_product p ON i.product_id = p.product_id WHERE p.product_id = ?) ORDER BY order_id

SELECT MAX(p.price) AS max_price, MIN(p.price) AS min_price, SUM(p.price) AS sum_price, AVG(p.price) AS avg_price, COUNT(1) AS count FROM t_order o INNER JOIN t_order_item i ON o.order_id = i.order_id INNER JOIN t_product p ON i.product_id = p.product_id GROUP BY o.order_id HAVING SUM(p.price) > ? ORDER BY max_price
SELECT * FROM t_order UNION ALL SELECT * FROM t_order ORDER BY order_id LIMIT 5, 5
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE order_id > ? UNION SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE order_id > ? ORDER BY order_id LIMIT 5, 5
SELECT o.order_id, o.user_id FROM t_order o WHERE o.order_id > ? UNION ALL SELECT i.order_id, i.user_id FROM t_order_item i WHERE i.order_id > ? ORDER BY order_id LIMIT 5, 5
SELECT o.order_id, o.user_id FROM t_order o WHERE o.order_id > ? UNION SELECT i.order_id, i.user_id FROM t_order_item i WHERE i.order_id > ? ORDER BY order_id
SELECT o.user_id FROM t_order o WHERE o.order_id > ? UNION ALL SELECT u.user_id FROM t_user u ORDER BY user_id LIMIT 5, 5
SELECT o.user_id FROM t_order o WHERE o.order_id > ? UNION SELECT u.user_id FROM t_user u ORDER BY user_id
SELECT * FROM t_order INTERSECT ALL SELECT * FROM t_order ORDER BY order_id LIMIT 5, 5
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE order_id > ? INTERSECT SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE order_id > ? ORDER BY order_id
SELECT o.order_id, o.user_id FROM t_order o WHERE o.order_id > ? INTERSECT ALL SELECT i.order_id, i.user_id FROM t_order_item i WHERE i.order_id > ? ORDER BY order_id
SELECT o.order_id, o.user_id FROM t_order o WHERE o.order_id > ? INTERSECT SELECT i.order_id, i.user_id FROM t_order_item i WHERE i.order_id > ? ORDER BY order_id
SELECT o.user_id FROM t_order o WHERE o.order_id > ? INTERSECT ALL SELECT u.user_id FROM t_user u ORDER BY user_id
SELECT o.user_id FROM t_order o WHERE o.order_id > ? INTERSECT SELECT u.user_id FROM t_user u ORDER BY user_id
SELECT * FROM t_order EXCEPT ALL SELECT * FROM t_order ORDER BY order_id
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE order_id > ? EXCEPT SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE order_id > ? ORDER BY order_id
